TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理 Web 應用程式的表單驗證服務。

span.span: Manages forms-authentication services for Web applications.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單驗證可讓使用者和密碼驗證的 Web 應用程式不需要 Windows 驗證。Forms authentication enables user and password validation for Web applications that do not require Windows authentication. 使用表單驗證，使用者資訊會儲存在外部資料來源，例如資料庫，或在應用程式的組態檔中。With forms authentication, user information is stored in an external data source, such as a database, or in the configuration file for an application. 一旦使用者通過驗證時，表單驗證會維護在 cookie 或在 URL 中的驗證票證，因此不需要提供每個要求的認證通過驗證的使用者。Once a user is authenticated, forms authentication maintains an authentication ticket in a cookie or in the URL so that an authenticated user does not need to supply credentials with each request. 藉由設定啟用表單驗證`mode`屬性的組態項目`Forms`。Forms authentication is enabled by setting the `mode` attribute of the configuration element to `Forms`. 您可以要求對應用程式的所有要求都包含有效的使用者驗證票證，以拒絕任何未知的使用者要求使用的組態項目，如下列範例所示。You can require that all requests to an application contain a valid user authentication ticket by using the configuration element to deny the request of any unknown user, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 在上述範例中，任何屬於應用程式的 ASP.NET 網頁的要求需要表單驗證所提供的有效使用者名稱。In the previous example, any request for an ASP.NET page that is part of the application requires a valid user name that is supplied by forms authentication. 如果沒有使用者名稱，然後將要求重新導向至設定。If no user name exists, then the request is redirected to the configured . 類別提供方法和屬性，您可以使用驗證使用者的應用程式中存取。The class provides access to methods and properties that you can use in an application that authenticates users. 方法將瀏覽器重新導向至設定使用者能夠登入應用程式。The method redirects a browser to the configured for users to log into an application. 回原始受保護的 URL 要求或是已驗證的使用者重新導向的方法。The method redirects an authenticated user back to the original protected URL that was requested or to the . 也有必要時可讓您管理表單驗證票證的方法。There are also methods that enable you to manage forms-authentication tickets, if needed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示為表單驗證會使用 ASP.NET 成員資格提供者並要求所有使用者都必須經過驗證的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that uses the ASP.NET membership provider for forms authentication and requires all users to be authenticated. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範使用表單驗證和 ASP.NET 成員資格的 ASP.NET 應用程式的登入頁面。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application that uses forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證方法驗證使用者認證儲存在應用程式組態檔的區段中。The Authenticate method verifies user credentials that are stored in the section of the application configuration file. 或者，您可以使用 ASP.NET 成員資格，來儲存使用者認證和呼叫驗證認證。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials and call the to verify the credentials. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 為了提升安全性，您可以加密儲存在應用程式的組態檔中使用的密碼方法。For improved security, you can encrypt passwords stored in the configuration file for an application by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示儲存在應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的使用者認證。The following code example shows user credentials stored in the Web.config file for an application. 密碼值已被使用雜湊方法。The password values have been hashed using the method. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的登入網頁方法以驗證使用者認證。The following code example shows a login page that uses the method to validate user credentials. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會反映值`cookieless`組態項目的屬性。The property reflects the value for the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element. 屬性會決定是否值將會在瀏覽器工作階段 cookie 中儲存或儲存在屬性。The property determines whether the value will be stored in a session cookie in the browser or stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 當值會儲存在 URI 中，所產生的 URI 的長度可能超過允許的最大長度。When the value is stored in the URI, the length of the generated URI may be longer than the maximum length allowed. 這是最有可能發生當屬性設定為應用程式名稱和應用程式名稱過長 （40 或多個字元），當應用程式中的使用者名稱很長，或當長字串會儲存在值。This is most likely to occur when the property is set to the application name and the application name is long (40 or more characters), when user names in the application are long, or when long strings are stored in the value. 如果所產生的 URI 太長，網頁伺服器會傳回`400 - Bad Request`錯誤。If the generated URI is too long, the Web server will return a `400 - Bad Request` error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`cookieless`屬性`AutoDetect`Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to `AutoDetect` in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會設定使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`組態項目的屬性。The property value is set using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the configuration element. 中檢查屬性方法時重新導向 URL 並未指向目前的應用程式中的頁面。The property is checked within the method when the redirect URL does not point to a page in the current application. 如果是`true`，然後執行重新導向; 如果是`false`，瀏覽器重新導向至網頁中定義屬性。If is `true`, then the redirect is performed; if is `false`, the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 當您將頁面重新導向所有應用程式時，您必須確定特定屬性中的組態項目會複製所有已驗證的應用程式。When you redirect pages across applications, you must make sure that specific attributes in the configuration element are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[Forms 應用程式之間的驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). > [!IMPORTANT] > 當允許跨應用程式重新導向時，您的網站受到入侵將導向至惡意網站的使用者，但您的網站使用的登入頁面。When cross-application redirects are allowed, your site is vulnerable to an exploit that directs users to a malicious Web site but uses the login page for your site. 一定要確認重新導向 URL 傳回方法是您預期如此您就可以確保您允許只重新導向至已核准的網站的 URL。Always verify that the redirect URL that is returned by the method is a URL that you expect so that you can make sure that you allow redirects only to approved Web sites. 您也必須確認重新導向 URL 會使用適當的通訊協定 （HTTP 或 HTTPS）。You must also verify that the redirect URL uses the appropriate protocol (HTTP or HTTPS). 若要執行這些驗證，您可以將回傳事件處理常式加入您的登入頁面，或您可以加入的處理常式事件控制項。To perform these verifications, you can add a postback event handler to your login page, or you can add a handler for the event of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`enableCrossAppRedirects`屬性`true`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute to `true` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，當您想要重新導向程式碼中執行應用程式而不是使用方法。You can use this method when you want to perform the redirect in your application code instead of using the method. 方法會傳回在查詢字串中，使用指定的 URL`ReturnURL`變數名稱。The method returns the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL 中`http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`、方法傳回的傳回 URL `caller.aspx`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method returns the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果`ReturnURL`變數不存在，方法會傳回中的 URL屬性。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method returns the URL in the property. 瀏覽器重新導向至登入頁面時，ASP.NET 會自動加入傳回的 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 根據預設，`ReturnUrl`變數必須參考目前應用程式內的頁面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果`ReturnUrl`頁面在不同的應用程式，或在不同伺服器上，是指方法傳回的 URL 中屬性。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods returns the URL in the property. 如果您想要讓傳回的 URL 來參考目前應用程式外的網頁，您必須設定屬性`true`使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`組態項目的屬性。If you want to allow the return URL to refer to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the configuration element. 這個方法不會建立 cookie。This method does not create a cookie. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定屬性`true`允許跨應用程式重新導向可能會造成安全性威脅。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將重新導向 URL 已驗證的使用者從傳回方法。The following code example redirects authenticated users to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立可以在應用程式的組態檔中使用時儲存表單驗證認證的雜湊的密碼值。The method creates a hashed password value that can be used when storing forms-authentication credentials in the configuration file for an application. 使用儲存在應用程式的組態檔中的驗證認證方法以驗證的應用程式的使用者密碼。Authentication credentials stored in the configuration file for an application are used by the method to verify passwords for users of an application. 或者，您可以使用 ASP.NET 成員資格來儲存使用者認證。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例採用使用者名稱、 密碼和雜湊型別，並顯示包含使用者定義和雜湊的密碼的設定 > 一節。The following code example takes a user name, password, and hash type and displays the section of the configuration that includes the user definition and hashed password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔中設定屬性值使用`requireSSL`組態項目的屬性。The property value is set in the configuration file for an ASP.NET application by using the `requireSSL` attribute of the configuration element. 您可以指定 Web.config 檔案中的 ASP.NET 應用程式是否需要 SSL （安全通訊端層） 的表單驗證 cookie 傳回給伺服器，藉由設定`requireSSL`屬性。You can specify in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application whether SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is required to return the forms-authentication cookie to the server by setting the `requireSSL` attribute . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 我們建議您設定如果`requireSSL`為`false`，也設定`slidingExpiration`為`false`可減少票證的有效的時間量。It is recommended that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`requireSSL`Web.config 檔案中的屬性。The following code example sets the `requireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file. ``` ```

summary.span: 從瀏覽器移除表單驗證票證。

span.span: Removes the forms-authentication ticket from the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除表單驗證票證資訊 cookie 或 URL 如果是`false`。The method removes the forms-authentication ticket information from the cookie or the URL if is `false`. 您可以使用方法搭配一位使用者登出，並允許不同的使用者登入的方法。You can use the method in conjunction with the method to log one user out and allow a different user to log in. 如果您執行專門在無 cookie 模式中，或者如果您支援已驗證和匿名使用者，您應該明確地控制重新導向至登入頁面，如果您需要特殊的商務邏輯執行因而移除的匿名識別項。If you run exclusively in cookieless mode, or if you support both authenticated and anonymous users, you should explicitly control the redirect to the login page if you require special business logic to execute as a result of removing the anonymous identifier. 當呼叫方法時，重新導向至應用程式的登入頁面會藉由呼叫方法`endResponse`參數設定為`false`。When the method is called, a redirect to the application's login page is made by calling the method with the `endResponse` parameter set to `false`. 重新導向不會直到目前的頁面已完成執行，因此可以執行額外的程式碼。The redirect does not take place until the current page has finished executing, so additional code can be run. 如果程式碼不包含明確的重新導向至另一個網頁，使用者會重新導向的應用程式組態檔中設定登入頁面。If the code does not contain an explicit redirect to another page, the user is redirected to the login page configured in the application's configuration file. 呼叫方法只會移除表單驗證 cookie。Calling the method only removes the forms authentication cookie. 網頁伺服器不會儲存日後比較的有效和過期的驗證票證。The Web server does not store valid and expired authentication tickets for later comparison. 這可讓您的站台遭受重新執行攻擊，如果惡意使用者取得有效的表單驗證 cookie。This makes your site vulnerable to a replay attack if a malicious user obtains a valid forms authentication cookie. 為了提高安全性，使用表單驗證 cookie 時，您應該執行下列作業：To improve security when using a forms authentication cookie, you should do the following: - 藉由設定表單驗證 cookie 使用絕對期限屬性`false`。Use absolute expiration for forms authentication cookies by setting the property to `false`. 這會限制在其中被盜用的 cookie 可以重新顯示視窗。This limits the window in which a hijacked cookie can be replayed. - 只會發行並接受驗證 cookie 的設定，透過安全通訊端層 (SSL)，藉由設定屬性`true`以及執行在 SSL 下整個網站。Only issue and accept authentication cookies over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), by setting the property to `true` and by running the entire Web site under SSL. 設定屬性`true`可確保，ASP.NET 將永遠不會傳送驗證 cookie 的瀏覽器透過非 SSL 連線，不過，用戶端可能會不會接受在 cookie 上安全的設定。Setting the property to `true` ensures that ASP.NET will never send an authentication cookie to the browser over a non-SSL connection; however, the client might not honor the secure setting on the cookie. 這表示用戶端可能會傳送表單驗證 cookie 透過非 SSL 連線，因此讓受到盜用。This means the client might send the forms authentication cookie over a non-SSL connection, thus leaving it vulnerable to hijack. 您可以防止用戶端藉由執行在 SSL 下整個網站，以清除傳送表單驗證 cookie。You can prevent a client from sending the forms authentication cookie in the clear by running the entire Web site under SSL. - 使用伺服器上的永續性儲存體記錄使用者登出網站，然後使用例如應用程式事件事件，以判斷目前使用者是否已驗證的表單驗證。Use persistent storage on the server to record when a user logs out of the Web site, and then use an application event such as event to determine whether the current user was authenticated with forms authentication. 如果使用者通過驗證的表單驗證，而且如果永續性儲存體中的資訊指出使用者登出，立即清除驗證 cookie 和瀏覽器重新導向回到登入頁面。If the user was authenticated with forms authentication, and if the information in persistent storage indicates the user is logged out, immediately clear the authentication cookie and redirect the browser back to the login page. 成功登入之後，更新儲存體以反映使用者已登入。After a successful login, update storage to reflect that the user is logged in. 當您使用這個方法時，應用程式必須追蹤登入之使用者的狀態，並且必須強制閒置使用者登出。When you use this method, your application must track the logged-in status of the user, and must force idle users to log out. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會清除表單驗證 cookie 使用方法，並重新導向至登入使用者頁面使用方法。The following code example clears the forms-authentication cookie using the method and redirects the user to the login page using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/CS/signoutcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/VB/signoutvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會設定使用`slidingExpiration`組態項目的屬性。The property value is set using the `slidingExpiration` attribute of the configuration element. 滑動期限會重設為有效的驗證 cookie 的到期時間提出要求，而且一半以上的逾時間隔已經經過。Sliding expiration resets the expiration time for a valid authentication cookie if a request is made and more than half of the timeout interval has elapsed. 如果 cookie 已過期，使用者必須重新驗證。If the cookie expires, the user must re-authenticate. 設定屬性`false`可以改善應用程式的安全性限制的時間，驗證 cookie 是否有效，根據已設定`timeout`值。Setting the property to `false` can improve the security of an application by limiting the time for which an authentication cookie is valid, based on the configured `timeout` value. 我們建議您設定如果`requireSSL`為`false`，也設定`slidingExpiration`為`false`可減少票證的有效的時間量。We recommend that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`slidingExpiration`屬性`false`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。The following code example sets the `slidingExpiration` attribute to `false` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```
